components.name: jumbotron
components.title: Audit Tool
components.text:
Web Application for audits, the main function are:
- Track audits activities
- Monitoring progress
- Archiving documentation

This application is implemented with the support of Alfa Company Internal Audit. The application is realized with the Meteor-Kitchen framework.

item_actions.name: print
item_actions.title: Print PDF

pages.name: dashboard_md

components.name: charts
audit_tool
components.source:
### Audit Tool

The AuditTool support the formalization of the main activities performed by the Internal Audit and track the monitoring detection.


#### The high level objectives of the application are:

* Automation of the audit plan (todo in release 1.0.0)
* Structure the information currently present in the word file.
* Automate checks for branch audits.
* Classify audit interventions, according to specific attributes (year, area / process covered, author, ...)
* Provide the progress of current activities.
* Single point for archive audits and attachments.
* Ensure the unmodifiable of the audit once archived

#### Some basic features

* Dashboard of status activities
* Print the audit reports
* Search tools for audit activities
* Approval mechanism of the audits
* User friendly web application
* Integration with other systems (eg Car.sci, Active Directory).
* Administration area to mantain the application.

pages.name: audit_execution
pages.title: Workflow attività di audit
pages.text: The various phases of the single "Audit" activity are shown below.

components.name: plan
components.source:
This section records the preliminary information of the activity, for example:
    
     Title
     Identification number of the activity
     Auditors
     Start date
     ....

components.name: fieldwork
components.source:
This section includes the individual verification activities carried out, defining the relative outcome for each

The tool provides a library of potential tasks to be performed.

components.name: issues
components.source:
In this section the shortcomings are recorded. The tool also allows:

     attach the documents
     classify the shortcomings
     ....

components.name: executive_summary
components.source: In this section the auditor is called to formalize the executive summary with the possibility of attaching any documents.

components.name: scoring
components.source: In this section the synthetic evaluation of the activity carried out is formalized.

pages.name: framework
pages.title: Framework
pages.text: Below are the key points of the Audit methodology.

components.name: audit_universe_mkdown
components.source:
### Audit Universe

The organizational structure contains all the operational, geographical, legal and product elements subject to audit.

The perimeter of the audit is the basis from which the risk assessment, the annual audit plan and the audit activities are developed.

** Roles involved: RIA **

components.name: risk_universe_mkdown
components.source:
### Risk Universe

The top-down Risk Assessment activity carried out to assess the inherent risk, the internal control system and the residual risk of all the elements identified in the audit perimeter.
The result of the Risk Assessment activity is necessary to define the annual audit plan.

** Roles involved: RIA **

components.name: audit_plan_markdown
components.source:
### Audit Plan

The annual audit plan is prepared on the basis of the results of the Risk Assessment activity, on the coverage of past audits, the activities of continuous controls and the comparison with the other control structures of the Bank

The planning process is carried out during the fourth quarter and is finalized before the beginning of the following year.

The audit plan consists of all audits to be carried out for each "auditable" entity during the subsequent one. Auditors and managers are assigned with the related responsibilities.

** Roles involved: RIA **

components.name: esecuzione_audit_markdown
components.source:
### Audit execution

The conduct of the audit is divided into four sub-phases:

1. notification of the audit,
2. Planning,
3. field work
4. reporting.

** Roles involved: Auditor **

components.name: gestione_carenze_markdown
components.source:
### Deficiency Management

During the audit work, the shortcomings are identified and discussed with the business. If agreed, the deficiencies are recorded and documented in the work papers. The auditor is responsible for ensuring that open deficiencies are resolved consistently with the approved action plan. The auditor updates the deficiency system with follow-up activities.

As soon as the business closes the deficiency and provides adequate evidence, the auditor should schedule time to review the documentation and validate that the deficiency has been remedied, through additional testing activities. Once the deficiency is validated the auditor definitively closes the deficiency.

** Roles involved: Auditor **

components.name: controlli_continuativi
components.source:
# Monitoring controls

The continuous monitoring / control activity has the objective of contributing to providing the Internal Audit with an updated view of any problematic situations, even if they are already known and followed by the competent corporate structures.
In this context, the Internal Audit assesses any direct interventions attributable to in-depth analysis of individual situations that, where appropriate, may give rise to specific audits (in the context of what has already been planned, anticipating activities, or carrying out unplanned activities).
